feed.title: Fedistar Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency eslint to ^9.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1582
  • Update dependency jsdom to v25 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1599
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to ^2.13.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1615
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1616
  • Update Rust crate once_cell to 1.20.2 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1617
  • Update dependency rust to v1.82.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1621
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1628
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.41.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1629
  • Update dependency next to ^14.2.17 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1614
  • Update Rust crate megalodon to 0.13.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1635
  • Update actions/checkout digest to 11bd719 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1636
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.0.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1640
  • Update dependency typescript to ^5.6.3 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1598
  • Update Rust crate serde to 1.0.214 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1627
  • Update Rust crate scraper to 0.21.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1642
  • Update dependency @types/jest to ^29.5.14 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1633
  • Update Rust crate megalodon to 0.14.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1650
  • Remove fragile favicon test by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1653
  • Update Rust crate serde to 1.0.215 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1645
  • refs #1609 Open post's detail from tags, lists, and profile by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1655
  • Update Node.js to v22 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1644
  • Update Node.js to v22 in CI by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1656
  • Update Rust crate serde_json to 1.0.133 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1652
  • Update dependency @types/react to v18.3.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1639
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.0.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1657

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.12...v1.9.13

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update readme for sponsors by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1664
  • Migrate Tauri v2 by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1658
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1666
  • Fix media window close menu by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1667
  • Use i18n for app menu by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1668
  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.12.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1659
  • Update Rust crate tracing to 0.1.41 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1663
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager to 2.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1665
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1669
  • Update dependency dayjs to ^1.11.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1586
  • Update dependency react-intl to ^6.8.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1619
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^8.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1624
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to ^7.37.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1632
  • Update Rust crate reqwest to >=0.12.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1637
  • Update Rust crate url to 2.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1638
  • Update dependency sass to ^1.82.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1641
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1646
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1680
  • Disable pin button in tag sidebar when it has already been pinned by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1682
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1681
  • Fix release CI by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1683

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.13...v1.10.0

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix building snap in CI by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1684
  • Update supporting SNS by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1686
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1687
  • Add icon to menu by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1688
  • Update prerequisites packages by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1689
  • Update dependency next to ^14.2.21 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1647

  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-global-shortcut to 2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1671

  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-clipboard-manager to ^2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1678
  • Update dependency typescript to ^5.7.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1661
  • Update Rust crate open to 5.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1648
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1685

  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager to 2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1697
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.42.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1698
  • Update dependency @tauri-apps/plugin-fs to ~2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1699
  • Update Rust crate tauri-plugin-process to 2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1675
  • Update tauri schemas by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1708
  • Update favicon when launching app by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1709
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1694
  • refs #1651 Hide menu when launching app by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1711

  • refs #1690 Use old libwebkit2gtk for linux builds by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1713
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1714
